item.title: 1 Always Sing the Song of the Divine
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 1 Always Sing the Song of the Divine 11 November 1975 am in Buddha Hall [NOTE: This is a translation from the Hindi series BHAJ GOVINDAM, literally: Singing the Song of the Divine. This version is the final edit pending publication, and is for research only.] OH IDIOT! SING THE SONG OF THE DIVINE, SING THE SONG OF THE DIVINE, SING THE SONG OF THE DIVINE, BECAUSE AT THE TIME OF DEATH THE MEMORIZATION OF GRAMMAR WILL NOT SAVE YOU.

item.title: 10 One Moment Is Sufficient
item.description: < Previous | Contents ‌CHAPTER 10 One Moment Is Sufficient 20 November 1975 am in Buddha Hall [NOTE: This is a translation from the Hindi series BHAJ GOVINDAM, literally: Singing the Song of the Divine. This version is the final edit pending publication, and is for research only.] The first question: Question 1 BELOVED OSHO, YESTERDAY YOU EXPLAINED THAT PRANAYAM IS THE METHOD WHICH EXPANDS THE BIO-ENERGY AND PRATYAHAR IS TO RETURN TO THE ORIGINAL SOURCE.

item.title: 2 The Attraction of the Transient
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 2 The Attraction of the Transient 12 November 1975 am in Buddha Hall [NOTE: This is a translation from the Hindi series BHAJ GOVINDAM, literally: Singing the Song of the Divine. This version is the final edit pending publication, and is for research only.] The first question: Question 1 BELOVED OSHO, SHANKARACHARYA TEACHES METAPHYSICS AND AT THE SAME TIME HE SINGS THE SONGS OF GOVINDA.

item.title: 3 Aloneness Through Satsang
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 3 Aloneness Through Satsang 13 November 1975 am in Buddha Hall [NOTE: This is a translation from the Hindi series BHAJ GOVINDAM, literally: Singing the Song of the Divine. This version is the final edit pending publication, and is for research only.] WHO IS YOUR WIFE? WHO IS YOUR SON? THIS WORLD IS VERY STRANGE. WHOSE ARE YOU? WHO ARE YOU? FROM WHERE HAVE YOU COME?

item.title: 4 Every Step Is The Destination
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 4 Every Step Is The Destination 14 November 1975 am in Buddha Hall [NOTE: This is a translation from the Hindi series BHAJ GOVINDAM, literally: Singing the Song of the Divine. This version is the final edit pending publication, and is for research only.] The first question: Question 1 BELOVED OSHO, IT IS SAID THAT SHANKARA WAS A HINDU VEDANTIN, AND YOU HAVE SAID THAT SHANKARA IS A HIDDEN BUDDHIST.

item.title: 5 The Bondage of Hope
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 5 The Bondage of Hope 15 November 1975 am in Buddha Hall [NOTE: This is a translation from the Hindi series BHAJ GOVINDAM, literally: Singing the Song of the Divine. This version is the final edit pending publication, and is for research only.] ONE WHO HAS LONG HAIR ON HIS HEAD, ONE WHO HAS SHAVED HIS HEAD, ONE WHO HAS PULLED HIS HAIR FROM THE ROOTS, ONE WHO IS WEARING OCHRE ROBES, OR IS DRESSED UP IN A VARIETY OF WAYS, THAT IDIOT, IN SPITE OF HAVING EYES, IS BLIND.

item.title: 6 Truth is not a debate
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 6 Truth is not a debate 16 November 1975 am in Buddha Hall [NOTE: This is a translation from the Hindi series BHAJ GOVINDAM, literally: Singing the Song of the Divine. This version is the final edit pending publication, and is for research only.] The first question: Question 1 BELOVED OSHO, YOU HAVE SAID MANY TIMES THAT A DIALOGUE IS NOT POSSIBLE THROUGH DEBATE.

item.title: 7 The Song of Life
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 7 The Song of Life 17 November 1975 am in Buddha Hall [NOTE: This is a translation from the Hindi series BHAJ GOVINDAM, literally: Singing the Song of the Divine. This version is the final edit pending publication, and is for research only.] ONE WHO HAS READ EVEN A LITTLE OF THE GITA, HAS DRUNK EVEN ONE DROP OF GANGES WATER AND HAS WORSHIPPED GOD EVEN A LITTLE, YAMA, THE GOD OF DEATH, CANNOT DESTROY HIM.

item.title: 8 The World is a School
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 8 The World is a School 18 November 1975 am in Buddha Hall [NOTE: This is a translation from the Hindi series BHAJ GOVINDAM, literally: Singing the Song of the Divine. This version is the final edit pending publication, and is for research only.] The first question: Question 1 BELOVED OSHO, WHEN SHANKARA WAS VERY YOUNG HIS MOTHER DID NOT GIVE HIM PERMISSION TO TAKE SANNYAS.

item.title: 9 The Mirror of Misery
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 9 The Mirror of Misery 19 November 1975 am in Buddha Hall [NOTE: This is a translation from the Hindi series BHAJ GOVINDAM, literally: Singing the Song of the Divine. This version is the final edit pending publication, and is for research only.] DROPPING SEX, ANGER, GREED AND ATTACHMENT, MEDITATE UPON YOURSELF: WHO AM I? BECAUSE IDIOTS WITHOUT SELF-REALIZATION SUFFER THE ANGUISH OF DEEP HELL HERE.
